Trade/Device Name(s): i-STAT CHEM8+ cartridge with the i-STAT 1 System
i-STAT CHEM8+ Cartridge with i-STAT 1 Analyzer
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for i-STAT CHEM8+ cartridge with the i-STAT 1 System for quantification of total carbon dioxide in arterial or venous whole blood using ion selective electrode technology.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantification of total carbon dioxide in arterial or venous whole blood in point of care or clinical laboratory settings for diagnosis, monitoring, and treatment of disorders related to acid-base balance.
